page.title: 01Coulby Newham.
page.content: Coulby Newham is a new town south of {Middlesbrough.}It is clean and quiet with lots of woods and open spaces.It has an adventure playground,Fairy Dell and a new park.It began in 1978 and the housing is modern and varied. Cycle tracks and paths link the estates which combine rented, private, sheltered, self_build and housing association property . South of Coulby Newham is grassland or arable farmland on which housing estates will be built in future. A District Centre is being built. It is going to be called the{Parkway Centre as it lies close to the dual carriageway of the A174, named Parkway, which links{Cleveland}with the A19. As well as shops this new development will have a sports centre, a health centre and a hotel.
